General.Name: ChengDu Hi-Tech Development Co Ltd
General.Description: ChengDu Hi-Tech Development Co., Ltd. engages in the construction, futures brokerage, kitchen cabinet manufacturing, real estate, and other businesses in China. It is involved in housing construction, municipal utilities, garden engineering, building decoration, etc.; and smart city construction and operation business, including the provision of smart city collection solutions, construction and operation, etc. The company also engages in futures brokerage business, including commodity futures brokerage, financial futures brokerage, futures investment consulting, etc.; power semiconductor business comprising sale of commodities, technical services, etc.; and asset management, investment management, etc. In addition, the company produces and sells kitchen cabinets and accessories, and furniture and accessories, as well as operates hotels. The company was formerly known as Chengdu Brilliant Development Group Co., Ltd. ChengDu Hi-Tech Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.
